full_summary:
**Tender Notification: Dock 1 Lighting Installation Services**
==============================================

**Notice Title**
--------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) issues Request for Proposals (RFP) for the structural and electrical construction services to replace the light pole system at Cap-aux-Meules wharf #1.

**Solicitation Details**
----------------------

*   Solicitation number: WS4279857143
*   Project reference number: EE519-241160
*   Posting date: October 30, 2023
*   Tender closing date: November 16, 2023, at 14:00:00
*   Expected contract start date: Not specified
*   Expected contract end date: March 31, 2024

**Procurement Method**
---------------------

This procurement is undertaken through a competitive and open bidding process, governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Bid Solicitation**
-----------------

Interested contractors can find more information on the solicitation through the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17865409?extsite=MTc4NjU0MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17865409?extsite=MTc4NjU0MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) or by contacting Jennifer Kirouac ([jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)), Contracts Officer.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   Contact person: Jennifer Kirouac, PSPC/SPAC
*   Email: [jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Purpose of the Contract**
---------------------------

This procurement aims to secure the services required to replace the light pole system at Cap-aux-Meules wharf #1. For more information on the solicitation, kindly refer to [link aforementioned](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17865409?extsite=MTc4NjU0MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) . The evaluation criterion will be based on a composite of price and other factors. A sole source contract is not
